question: \( \text{If the rate of change of a quantity is given by } g(x) = 4e^{2x}, \text{ find the function } G(x). \)
\( \text{If } f(z) = z^3 + 2z^2 + iz, \text{ where } i = \sqrt{-1}, \text{ find the real part of } f(1+i). \)
\( \text{Find the integral of } p(x) = x^2e^{-x}. \)
\( \text{If } y = \frac{\sin(2x)}{\cos(3x)}, \text{ find the derivative using quotient rule.} \)
\( \text{Given } q(z) = z + i, \text{ find the modulus of } q(i). \)
